content.rendered:
I’m in London, UK, getting to face my personal demons and live a good life here or somewhere in the countryside. This is what I spend time doing now:

  • Working a full time job as a software developer
  • (Re)Building my career as a performer – singer and actor
  • Composing pieces and songs for myself as well as for theatre and film
  • Aiming to become a better artist every day

My priorities are:

  • Decide to be happy and break my thinking patterns
  • Cope with loss of my mum who passed away on 11th October 2021
  • Cope with being on my own after my relationship ended
  • Live less stressful and more meaningful life
  • Become more productive, so I can bring balance between my professional and personal life
  • Get closer to God

If my activities or priorities happen to change, I’ll update this page to reflect those changes. Last update was 22nd November 2021.

This page is a public declaration and a reminder to myself what is really important. I found this template thanks to Thomas Frank, who was inspired by Derek Sivers.
